videos.description: LeBron James expresses his desire to play as much as possible for the Cavaliers and breaks down what went wrong for Cleveland against the Bulls.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Interview (LeBron: 'If I can walk, I can go') 2017/01/04

videos.headline: LeBron: 'If I can walk, I can go'
